评论详情: Fit well, flattering
I pack six of these swimsuits for vacation and they were absolutely perfect!

Firstly, it was an obvious return that no one cared to properly repackage. It was basically just stuffed in the bag and had a business card stuck on top, so someone did see it, to put the card in it, but didn't address the item to fold it decently. The crotch sticker was not on the crotch area, but was stuck inside near it. So was it worn?? Who knows, but yuck. Material is flimsy, there is no tummy control as was advertised, and the chest has no support (actually squishes the chest down). So no compression where there should be, and compression where there shouldn’t be. I wouldn’t have liked it regardless, but in addition to all that, once it was on, I saw that under the chest, on the outside totally visible, there was a long mess of sewing string hanging right in the middle front. Clearly a defect in the construction. I thought these were supposed to be decent quality, but it’s absolutely junk.
was looking for a bathing suit that didn’t reveal everything under the sun and modest yet fashionable . Beautiful. Very pleased!
I actually get compliments on this all the time. It's funny because it's a risque dress and a modest swimsuit. I wear it as both when I go to the lake. I don't need a coverup!
The liner of the suit is a bit rough and itchy. The suit is pretty heavy duty so not super comfortable to wear on hot days at the beach.

Wore this to go to the pool with my friends and it was so cozy the whole time! It’s easy to get on and off as well! As a bigger chested person it can be hard to find clothing (especially bathing suits) that fit my top and bottom). It barely needed to stretch to fit me! It also doesn’t have that weird filmy feeling that makes it hard to remove bathing suits.
Swimsuit fits well and is great quality for the price. Would purchase again.
I love this bathing suit /dress. It is so comfortable and slims you down in all the right places! Perfect for a family bbq/pool party !
It was perfect for swimming perfect sizing for me! Excellent coverage

It’s ok but it has a weird white band on the bottom, looks like the seam is messed up or the fabric was printed incorrectly. Very odd. Not sure I’ll wear it in public again.

If you are a curvy girl, you will love this swimsuit. I put it on as soon as I received it. It is so feminine and makes me feel great. The fit is flattering and covers up what I need to. After delving into all the reviews on fit, I purchased a Size L and fits perfectly.
should have ordered a size smaller,
My husband bought this for me and it was good for what I needed it for. It is a flattering and good fit. The chest area was a little loose with not enough support.
I love this swimsuit! It fit true to size and doesn't bunch up in the water!
This suit is just like what I needed, longer length and nice straps. The color is very pretty and it looks great with just some white tennis shoes. True to size

The material is a little thick, but it’s adorable (I got the black with white polka dots) and flattering, or at least hides the things I want it to hide. It’s comfy. It’s cute. Can’t ask for much more other than pockets. Ha. Took off one star because the part that kind of goes around the top of the straps (in the front) looks a little faded after just one wear. Hopefully it won’t continue to fade. (Also, if you’ve never worn a swim dress before like me, when you bend forward to spray your legs, the skirt part will dip forward/down and cover your knees when you spray sunscreen. So take my advice and also LIFT the skirt to spray your knees. Otherwise you may get sunburned knees like I did. Oops!)
Fits amazingly. It exactly what I ordered. Size is spot on. Great value for the price.
I Love the Style, Thickness of fabric and fit! Perfection it s.
Hits at good length and adjustable straps under wider strap is a plus

I’m a mom of four children and pretty chubby, in mid 40’s and don’t feel comfortable in swimsuit. This piece is comfortable and covers everything well made me feel comfortable and confident. I’m 5’3” 175 lbs large fit perfect with a little room if I loose weight to 165 it will be too big ( for reference) It is very well constructed and it is heavy when wet. It won’t dry up in one afternoon just hanging somewhere.

This suit fits well and looks cute on. Underneath the skirt are short bicycle shorts that are attached to the suit body. I would prefer if the underside was a standard attached panty bottom. This makes it easier to pull it to the side for bathroom breaks, whereas the bike short bottoms require pulling the whole bathing suit down to your lower thighs when you have to go to the ladies room. I can tell you that this was quite a nuisance at the pool party I attended yesterday. It was quite a workout pulling down a wet swim suit off of a damp/wet body. It was even harder pulling the wet suit back on; I literally started to break a sweat, and was thankful nobody else was in the room to bear witness to my struggles! I may ask a friend who sews if she can modify the bike short bottoms to a classic panty for this purpose. Other than that, I got several compliments on the swim suit at the 4th of July party I attended yesterday, and I was comfortable all day.
I’m a size 10 and ordered a large and it is perfect.
It's quite obviously a "squishy mom" bathing suit, but having said that, it definitely hides the squishy parts! And it has built in boy shorts, which I love. It was flattering & fit well.
A bit tight. But I'm working on losing the weight. 😊💙💜❣💓
This suit is slim around my waist and the skirt twirls around my waist which causes a very slimming effect. It slips on comfortably and I love it!!!
item was bigger than i needed should have bought a large.  i bought a xl in recommendation of amazon but it’s too lose

评论概述: No hem. Two sets of straps???
评论详情: The swimsuit we ordered was One piece Swimdress Tummy control with V neck, blue and white print in small. This swimsuit has no hem at bottom edge. The shorts underneath are navy blue. It has 2 sets of straps. The wide strap which you see in the photo and then a thin strap underneath which is adjustable. When you adjust the under strap to a small shorter length, the cover strap doesn't stretch and shrink to fit so it falls off the shoulder. You can see the understrap in one of the videos on the product page, but the model must be able to wear the swimsuit with understrap at longest setting, because is does not fall off her shoulder. If you are small and have to adjust strap to shortest length then the over strap just falls loose off the shoulder.
Wanted a better fitting bathing suit that was very flattering. Not only did it exceed my expectations but it made my husband do a double take when I tried it on!
This is a cute swim dress which is good in shape and support.

I am a 67-year-old female but even at that age, this swimsuit gives me a nice curve to my figure, holds in my stomach, and has a long enough skirt to cover a lot of the legs. Nice feel and beautiful colors. Love this suit so much I ordered two different prints.

Oh, I’m so pleased with this swim dress, actually. I’ve wanted one for ages but never really had an occasion to get a new swimsuit, but then a professor of mine hosted a pool party and I wanted to wear something more modest and nicer-looking than my practical-but-frumpy one-piece suits. So, I bought this specific swim dress because the crossed chest looked very elegant and even the critical reviews seemed promising….and I am so happy with it!! There is some critique about the straps being doubled, with the adjustable belt straps underneath non-adjustable neoprene straps, but they worked fine enough for me that I don’t have any significant comments on them. The L fit worked out wonderfully for me (I am 5’5” and about 180 lbs with rather broad shoulders), and the dress is comfortable to wear both dry and wet. When it IS in water, the skirt does float up around you, of course, and when out again it has added weight but not extremely so! I find that if you wring or squeeze out the water it dries fairly well, although definitely not as fast as a non-skirted swimsuit. Overall, it’s a general recommendation from me for sure! Super happy with this, thank you!
The size chart was right on and I feel comfortable in public wearing this suit.
Fit great and comfortable.
I wore this to beach last week and it’s perfect
I this swim suit is made from comfortable material and fits nicely. It is well with the price. I will buy from this company again!

If you are 60+ years, this is the suit for you. It fits well, has hidden shorts and the skirt goes down to mid thigh. I love the suit's design and the tropical colors. I can't say enough about this one. A+
Great fit, comfortable.
The fit is perfect and looks great on. Now I just have to test in the water. The material is stretchy and the detail in the front is very attractive. The color was exactly what was pictured.

I ordered this Grace Karin swim dress in the orange print size M after following size guide and first ordering blue print size L. I’m a size 12 top, 8-10 bottom. My bust sits high, and the concealed adjustable straps allowed for a great fit. I liked that the attached boy short was orange. The blue print suit had a black short. (I kept the blue print because I needed a swimsuit right away, the bust fit well, and I like the blue print.)  this suit design is flattering for an old lady looking to hide some flabby parts. I will probably order another size M suit, different color, hopefully with coordinating short color.

Buying swimsuits always gives me such anxiety but after reading reviews I decided to give this one a shot! I absolutely love it! It is so flattering and very comfy! Seems to be good quality and a great fit! The ruching in the midsection gives me a nice shape and the straps are adjustable to give the needed support! There is padding in the top also. Im 5”2’ and 180lbs I got a XL and it fits great! I love that it has shorts underneath and not a brief style bottom. I haven’t felt this comfortable in a swimsuit in a very long time!
This is a super cute swimsuit, but appears to run large. Will be returning
It's a very flattering swim suit.
Didn't  like the way it fit

评论详情: The bathing suit fits perfect. I wear it in a water class, there are a lot of black and white polka dot suits which is my other suit. Good quality, good feel, right coverage, I feel pretty. And it was a great price. I didn’t want to pay $60 for a suit, that’s just crazy these days.

This is a very pretty, stylish, and color fading resistance bathing suit. It has nice coverage and very durable fabric. It fits perfectly! I am so happy about everything concerning this wonderful bathing suit!

I absolutely love this bathing suit! The size was spot on and the design gives me the appearance of being about 10lbs smaller, no kidding! The quality seems good and I love the pattern. Definitely recommend!
Very cute!
Adorable, but I don't know how much I'll use it due to how heavy it is.

The wider, decorative strap doesn't adjust, so I will have to tack it or something. I took off one star for that. Cute and comfy, love the shorts underneath!

There’s everything to like about this swim dress.  It is revealing enough for the beach and modest enough for a stop at restaurants & bars.  The length is perfect about 3in above knee.  The flattering cut shows off my best attributes waist, & bust. I love that the designer went for less material for the skirt.  My sister-in-laws went nuts for it.  So many compliments.
This suit is absolutely gorgeous and flattering. Fits perfect. Size XL 195 5’6.
I love this suit. It covered all the parts it was supposed to. Very comfortable. Highly recommend.

Even though I did return this one (size 18+) because it was a bit loose across my chest, I wish I didn't have to and will re-order a size down. It is a very flattering suit and the black cherry pattern is beautiful! 5'0" and 174 lbs.

This is a well made swimsuit.  I valued the extra adjustable straps beneath the decorative shoulder straps.  The crossover design on the bust adds a nice statement.  It is supportive without constricting movements.  It has not stood up well to the chlorine in the pool I frequent but they seem to use a particularly strong brand.  Overall, I would recommend.

It is real cute but the design is a little strange regarding the straps.  There are four straps rather than the usual 2 and one set only is adjustable.  It also runs one size too small compared to the other suits I have ordered through Amazon

评论概述: It makes me feel good about myself again!
评论详情: This is the first suit. that I have felt good about for a long time. As I sit here, I am debating whether to buy the black and white one. I bought the black with cherries and love it! I am 5ft 3in and weigh 165 pounds. I tried both the large and XL, I kept the XL even though the large fit. The large wasn't uncomfortable but, I have MS and Parkinson's disease and it causes pain when wearing something too constrictive so went with the XL. A little more room in the belly and less back fat showing. I have lost another 5 pounds so now wondering if I want to buy the black and white in LG. Some might say this is not a sexy suit, but I disagree and so does my husband. I took out the breast pads and still show cleavage, The skirt shows off the butt quite nicely in a flirty kind of way and my stomach has not looked this good in a suit for years. The shorts are built into the suit which I love, and it is easy to put on. The material is kind of heavy and the skirt lays like it should. I can't say what it is like when wet as I bought it for when were in Hawaii, at the end of April. Give the suit a try if you're on the fence about it.  So glad I did, my self-esteem went up way higher than it was when trying other suits on.
It seems to be very flattering, but it does run very small. I should have gotten a size up.

I love the fit of this swim dress. I was looking for something modest. This is definitely modest yet also very cute!  I read a review that said it’s heavy when wet. I do think the material is heavy. I’ll probably be selective about where I wear this suit.  It wouldn’t be a suit for an active day in the pool.  I’m 5’4” 110 lbs and bought a small.
This swimsuit is cute and flattering! I love the color and the floral pattern. Can't wait to wear it this summer!
Wow…. Just love this suit! It fits perfectly and is comfortable! Very flattering.
Beautiful colors, fits great I love it
Comfortable and stylish for someone my age.

After I put this suit on, I began to tighten the straps.  You'll notice that there are 2 straps per arm.  One is thin & is used to tighten or loosen the fit.  The other one, is thicker & lays right over the thin strap, giving the suit a more "finished" look.  The problem that I had was, after I tighten the straps, the thicker strap that laid over the thinner strap was far to loose.  I suppose I could have attached the loose material with a safety pin or cut the loose material & sewed it back together.  It wasn't worth my time or effort, so I sent it back.

评论概述: Got this for a vacation last year
评论详情: This swimsuit is adorable and looks fantastic! It’s incredibly well made.

I got this swimdress to use for my summer pool day outings. I had been wanting a swimdress for the longest. This dress met all my expectations and then some! To begin, it gives a nice push up to the breasts 😉 I did have to remove the pads that came inside the bra area, it fit me a little tight until I removed them and I had no more issues. The straps length can be adjusted as well. Also, the Tummy coverage is good! The ruffles in the fabric and the flowy skirt give the tummy area a good look. The skirt is long enough to cover everything that needs to be covered. This was a huge plus for me! In summary, the fabric quality of this dress is nice. It's thick and just makes this dress look very high quality. I definitely recommend it! It's very flattering 😉
I ordered 2 types and this one went back. 1 looked a little better. But not a bad suit
Size is true to size. Very comfortable. Love it
